item.title: Y2024Q2 影视音总结
item.description: MOVIES 2024-04-03. 又见逍遥 - rating: ★★☆☆☆ 2024-04-03. 草木人间 - rating: ★★★★☆ 2024-04-17. 追风者 - rating: ★★★★☆ 2024-04-19. 年少日记 - rating: ★★★★★ 2024-04-23. 城中之城 - rating: ★★★★☆ 2024-04-29. 哈尔滨一九四四 - rating: ★★★☆☆ GAMES MUSIC 2024-04-30. Fall in Love - by Sophie Chen, Vicky Chen from the album ‘Fall in Love’ 2024-04-30. Time (Feat. Rado) - by Trouble Maker, Rado from the album ‘Trouble Maker’ 2024-04-30. BLACK - by G-DRAGON, Sky Ferreira from the album ‘COUP D’ETAT’ 2024-04-30.
